events.restart: osascript -e 'display notification "Application restarted" with title "Nodemon" sound name "Frog"'
events.exit: osascript -e 'display notification "Application terminated" with title "Nodemon" sound name "Basso"'
events.crash: osascript -e 'display notification "Application crashed" with title "Nodemon" sound name "Basso"'
